column3: â€œI would highly recommend Big Wreck to any one in need of a fairly long lasting potent medication, The sativa affect of the Train wreck is just enough to overpower the indica potency of the Big Bud. Its a great strain over all.â€
â€œTextbook good bud. A striking coat of crystals is immediate obvious even at a distance. Is that shit white?" Quote
and especially when ground
column4: this bud has some surprisingly pleasant fruit and floral notes. Jasmine

column3: almost pine-sol taste
column4: this bud impresses on all fronts.

column3: â€œThis was a very classic tasty strain. Live the flowery aftertaste and euphoric stone. Will grab another gram or two if I see it again.â€

â€œBig nugs that are frosty.  Smooth smoke so very little coughing which is a great thing after almost coughing my lungs up with a very heavy Kush I had.  This helped my headache almost immediately and I was much better after a small bowl.  I love PTrainwreck but this one is right up there.â€
â€œIt is an intense experience. Often with deep insights ... some pleasant ... some not so ... all worthwhile. It came on hard here but afterwards left a nice calming energy.â€
â€œgood shit lol very relaxing. makes you forget what you were thinking. gives you the munchies.. I'm craving some bacon.â€

â€œThe flavor profile on Big Wreck is right on point. I get very floral and earthy notes from this resin coated flower. It's an intense indica dominant strain that comes through with its immediate onset of body sedating effects that linger for far longer than other strains I've came across. I was almost too stoned to consider writing a review from the beginning stages of this high but that's when the Sativa started to s...â€

â€œVery large and bodacious nugs, with good crystal content
could really see the sativa pheno come out vs its indica counterpart and it has a very sweet and almost sour flavor profile,Smells like peppered mangos.Great for on the go during the day or at work,but not recommended for a relaxing bong toke before bedâ€
â€œgood shit lol very relaxing. makes you forget what you were thinking. gives you the munchies.. I'm craving some bacon.â€
â€œThis strain (from Local Product of Colorado) had phenomenal trichome production, a powerful head and body high, and a smell that made you think it was time to change a diaper.â€

â€œDefinitely one of our best strains!  Buds are dense and extremely frosty!  Rolled a whole blunt of it and it burned smooth and tasted phenomenal...for the price it was totally worth it!  The high was long lasting, it made me nice and sleepy but was not heavy enough to cause couch lock.  It did cause me to get the munchies hard core, so it would be good for someone who has problems with nausea or lack of appetite.  Th...â€

â€œLOVE this strain! The plant I bought is from Mtn View Naturals in Hood River and although it is an indica dominant hybrid, I have found it beautifully relaxing without making me tired or groggy at all. Also puts me in a great mood; laid back, happy and even a bit cuddly at times ğŸ˜‰ Thanks to Miss Emmy for such a wonderful little plant.â€

â€œHad the concentrate form of Big Wreck and it's a fantastic choice for indica fans. I've had it in the morning and it calmed my anxiety throughout the day. Prefer at night in small to medium sized dabs. Redefined what an indica is for me. Give it a try! 5/5â€

â€œThis was my first foray into the legal Medical Marijuana dispensaries here in Arizona.
I had been illegally growing my own strains for the past 20 years.
I have a spinal cord injury that prevents me from working.
If it were not for MJ, I would be taking some serious narcotics for my pain and muscle spasms. Those meds are so debilitating, they make you want to sleep all the time, sleep may not be the correct term, may...â€

â€œI like Big Wreck but it's one probably for a littlelater in the day. The buds are on the rounder, chunky side, they're very dense, bright green in color, with bright orange hairs and it's absolutely covered in sticky frosty triches the stuff I have gotten doesn't have a ton of color but it's still definitely a looker It's initially kinda upbeat. It starts with some energy, a great body high, and a bit of that Trainwr...â€
â€œNice woodsy taste and a good mellow high. Perfect for a relaxing evening or before bed. Definitely going to try this one again.â€

â€œThis strain will actually wreck you! 4 trenches with the magic flight launch box with my buddy and we were gone for hours! This stuff is potent and tastes great. Highly recommended for stress relief and overall relaxation. Also can help with headaches and nausea.Try it and Big Wreck will not cease to wreck you!â€
â€œvery tasty, definitely lives up to the name! BIG buds and gets me wrecked every time ğŸ˜â€
â€œ5out of tenâ€
â€œThis is a great smoke. using for pain management. I went from unbearable to relaxed in just minutes.â€

â€œI chose this because others have used it for migraines.  I  Smoked some tonight and it cleared up my nausea very well but the headache relief was rather brief.  My headache came back after about an hour.  

Very mellow and relaxing high.â€
â€œPut me in a great mindset of relaxation and  euphoriaâ€

â€œI like Big Wreck probably a little more later in the day. It's buds are on the rounder chunky side, they're super dense & sticky. It's bright green in color, lots of bright orange hairs and blanketes of frosty triches. The stuff I've gotten hasn't had a ton of color but it's still quite a looker. Smell wise there isn't any of that Trainwreck piney twang to it. It's closer to Big Bud it's sweet, & fruity with a earthy...â€

â€œthe flowers look so beautiful, with hints of purple surrounding it. 
very floral type flavor. perfect for before bed time or dinner, gives the munchies pretty hard. lol. also I recommend this strain for people that suffer from anxiety because of its relaxing  effects.â€
â€œbig wreck makes me sassy!â€
â€œThis is really strong! After using this strain my body felt very warm and relaxed. This strain will really calm you down.â€

â€œthose vatos at Valley of the Sun Goodyear know how to grow some phenomenal Mota ..... big wreck just dropped and one toke and I my mind was blown ... highly recommended ... thc over 26% .... not for lightweightsâ€

â€œPowerful indica. Hit hard with both body and cerebral high. Do not plan on getting much done but you will feel stoned and happy.â€
â€œNice woodsy taste and a good mellow high. Perfect for a relaxing evening or before bed. Definitely going to try this one again.â€

â€œvery smooth smoke, the high was excellent, probably a new favorite for me. I
It has an intense body high that I cant wait to experience again. This also stick around for a long time, it definitely lives up to its name. This will lock you down and make you feel like warm water is lapping over your body.â€

It starts with some energy, a great body high, and a bit of that Trainwr...â€

â€œGood stuff, very potent. 4 trenches with Lucas, we were GONE for hours.â€
â€œIm a huge Trainwreck strain fan, and when i saw BBTW" AKA "Big Bud Train Wreck" for sale
column4: i was in. This strain was a bit underwhelming
column5: to be honest. Compared to Purple Trainwreck for example
column6: and BBTW wasnt nearly as "trainwrecky". BBTWs buzz lasted a long time
column7: but the high wasn't as trippy and potent as some other trainwrecks out there. A solid mid
column8: but far from the best trainwreck.â€"

column3: â€œGreat medicine to control PTSD issues.â€

â€œI've heard people talk about the body-high from this strain and to me it was just more that I was super relaxed/couch-locked. I didn't get the tingly/floaty/lifted feeling that I usually associate with a good body-high... Still, this stuff is very good for when you just want to mellow out, fall asleep, or just generally turn into a happy potato.â€
â€œI used this to sleep, it worked way better than a lot of the strains ive smoked. Definitely would use this again. Made me relaxed, sleepy and a lil hungry.â€

â€œTonite I'm vaping flower, some of the Bad Wreck I picked up tonite from Glisan Buds.  At last, after 3 weeks, my crush Goth Boy was there!  He wasn't my budtender but we did exchange a few lines.  I probably outweigh him by 80 lbs.

Per Leafly, Big Wreck is the indica-dominant cross of Big Bud and Trainwreck. This chunky combination offers functional relaxation with an uplifted mental buzz that some might describe a...â€"
